experience_details.responsibilities: Defined Business Architecture; Conducted BRD/FRS; Developed process flows, use case diagrams, and data models; Bridged between business users and technical teams; Created wireframes, UI prototypes, and workflow diagrams; Worked in Agile/Scrum; Applied ITIL Practices; Conducted manual testing; Coordinated and conducted UAT; Generated MIS reports and dashboards; Led stakeholder management; Ensured cross-functional coordination; Delivered case studies and best practice recommendations for ERP alignment and compliance.

Built periodic MIS reports and dashboards for Coal India and State Gencos; Automated Power BI data refresh using Excel; Created financial and operational visualizations using DAX; Contributed to interim reporting for Ministry of Railways.
Handled invoicing for 250+ coal sector clients; Drafted BRDs in consultation with key stakeholders; Generated actionable insights through Power BI and Excel dashboards.

Coordinated 600 assessors across 200+ team projects pan-India; Led analytics for 4321 Urban Local Bodies on sanitation performance; Ensured 100% accuracy in data collection using pivot-based analytics.
